00051  *
00052  *  Description:  Header for a self-resizing buffer useful for reading in files

00062 #ifndef MBUF_H
00063 #define MBUF_H
00064 
00065 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00066 #include <config.h>
00067 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00068 
00069 typedef struct Mbuf
00070 {
00071   char *buf;
00072   int cur_len;
00073   int max_len;
00074 }
00075 Mbuf;
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 extern "C"
00079 {
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 /* External variables */
00083   extern L_Alloc_Pool *Mbuf_pool;
00084 
00085 /* Mbuf prototypes */
00086   extern Mbuf *create_Mbuf ();
00087   extern void free_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00088   extern void clear_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00089   extern void addc_to_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf, char ch);
00090   extern void adds_to_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf, char *str);
00091   extern void pad_Mbuf_to_len (Mbuf * mbuf, int desired_len, char pad_ch);
00092   extern void strip_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00093   extern int len_of_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00094   extern char *get_Mbuf_buf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00095   extern char *copy_Mbuf_buf (Mbuf * mbuf);
00096   extern int match_Mbuf (Mbuf * mbuf, char *string);
00097 
00098 #ifdef __cplusplus
00099 }
